info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Transylvania, northwestern Henderson and southeastern Haywood Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 553 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Brevard, or near Looking Glass. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brevard, Graveyard Fields, B.R. Parkway-Mount Pisgah To The Nc Arboretum, Mount Pisgah, Looking Glass, Cruso, Penrose, North Transylvania and Little River In Transylvania County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
